mapper.select: SELECT T1.chat_room_order AS chatRoomOrder ,T1.sender_order AS senderOrder ,T1.receiver_order AS receiverOrder ,T1.create_dt AS createDt ,T1.modify_dt AS modifyDt ,T2.nickname AS senderNickname ,T3.nickname AS receiverNickname FROM adgomin_chat_room T1 LEFT JOIN adgomin_user T2 ON T1.sender_order = T2.user_order LEFT JOIN adgomin_user T3 ON T1.receiver_order = T3.user_order WHERE 1=1 AND sender_order = #{userOrder} OR receiver_order = #{userOrder} ORDER BY T1.modify_dt DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adgomin_chat_room (sender_order, receiver_order, create_dt, modify_dt) VALUES (#{senderOrder}, #{receiverOrder}, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO adgomin_chat_message (chat_room_order, sender_order, receiver_order, message) VALUES (#{chatRoomOrder}, #{senderOrder}, #{receiverOrder}, #{message})
